data.title: Nia Long
data.text:
AKA Nitara Carlynn Long

Born: 30-Oct-1970

Birthplace: Brooklyn, NY

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: Black

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Third Watch

Mother: Talita

Boyfriend: Massai Z. Dorsey (one son, ex-)
